original_text: They pounced on the plunder and, taking sheep, cattle and calves, they butchered them on the ground and ate them, together with the blood.
korean_text: 백성이 이에 탈취한 물건에 달려가서 양과 소와 송아지들을 끌어다가 그것을 땅에서 잡아 피째 먹었더니

sentences.original_text: and, taking sheep, cattle and calves
they butchered them on the ground
and ate them, together with the blood
